snippet: Schneider made 21 saves for his first shutout of the season, and Mike Cammalleri had a goal and two assists to lead the Devils to their 10th win.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Ottawa Senators, 2-1, in shootout; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Schneider made 21 saves for his first shutout of the season, and Mike Cammalleri had a goal and two assists to lead the Devils to their 10th win.

headline.print_headline: Boyle Lifts Rangers to Eighth Straight Win
headline.main: Devils Dominate Penguins as Cory Schneider Earns Shutout
